⚙️ Lesson 2: Setup & First Program

⏱️ 15 min | Beginner

Installing C

/* Windows: Use MinGW or MSVC */
/* macOS: Install Xcode Command Line Tools */
/* Linux: sudo apt-get install gcc */

Writing Your First Program

#include <stdio.h>
int main() {
  printf("My first C program!\n");
  return 0;
}

Compiling & Running

gcc program.c -o program
./program
